title: Help the Hag Survivors
content:
e more powerful.

Help the Hag Survivors Objectives

Visit Barren's Coop Go to Old Garlows Place Cure Mayrina Report to the hag's surivivors Defeat the hag's minion Speak with Mayrina

Help the Hag Survivors Walkthrough

After unlocking the quest, travel to Barren's Coop. You will find clues (letter on the table) that the Hag Survivors were evicted and are now holed up at Old Garlow's Place. Mayrina, the girl you saved from Aunt Ethel, is at Old Galow's Place (X-52, Y-148), Baldur's Gate Lower C
